***This is a permanent role with one of the valued client of People Impact.***
**Role Summary**
 Seeking a Senior Developer with strong backend engineering skills and hands\\-on experience in building and scaling AI\\-powered systems. This role focuses on designing robust architectures, operationalizing AI models, and enabling production\\-grade deployments across cloud, hybrid, or edge environments.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and develop scalable backend architectures for AI/ML systems
* Build APIs, microservices, and AI workflow pipelines (training, serving, monitoring)

**Required Skills**

**Education**

title: SDE 2
description:
**Company:** 
 Procedure
   

  

**Website:** 
 Visit Website
   

  

**Business Type:** 
 Small/Medium Business
   

  

**Company Type:** 
 Product \\& Service
   

  

**Business Model:** 
 B2B
   

  

**Funding Stage:** 
 Bootstrapped
   

  

**Industry:** 
 Software Development
   

  

**Job Description**
 Hey there!
   

  

 We are looking for a curious developer to join our
 **Backend** 
 team at Procedure. We are a product development company established in early 2017\\. Before we dive into the job description, allow us to introduce ourselves.
   

  

 Our team is a mixed bag. Of the smart and the hard workers. Of the organised and slightly chaotic. Of the early risers and the burners of the midnight oil. We appreciate diversity and truly like having differing perspectives in the room.
   

  

 We pride ourselves on being early adopters of the latest tools, libraries and frameworks while consistently delivering business value. People who work with us fall in love with their craft. We have changed the definition of "work" for them.
   

  

**Here Are Some Of Our Beliefs About Work**
* Work is only 1 part of your life and not your entire life. We treat it as such.
* Weekends are sacred and not to be messed around with. So you won't be asked to work on one.
* Commuting is a waste of time. Working from home saves you additional time. Go crazy with it.
* Side gigs are welcome. We believe there are multiple avenues to learn and grow. So why restrict it only to work?
* Asynchronous by\\-default. Synchronous communication is expensive, so we default to writing docs and literature to enable async communication.
* Good things come in pairs. Errors get halved. Productivity, ideas and fun get doubled. Learning gets accelerated exponentially.
* Learning from mistakes. If you are not making mistakes and learning from them, you are not growing.


 Apart from work, we continually invest in growing you as a professional and a human.
   

  

* Extensive Boot Camp \\- get to learn, regardless of your experience, about Data Structure and Algorithms, LLD, HLD, DevOps, frontend, backend and/or test engineering.
* Book club \\- broaden your horizons by picking up a book every month and have fun doing so
* P1, The Half Yearly Tech Conference \\- here's where we explore futuristic themes to keep you informed about what's happening in the tech space outside our office.
* Internal Projects \\- where your craft, experiment and learning precedence over deadlines. Also, try out new technologies and domains.


**Growth requires mentorship**
 We believe choosing a mentor is more important than choosing a company. My co\\-founder, Braj, and I have more than a decade of experience in our respective fields. I will be mentoring you to become a better engineer and a coder. Braj will help you with domain expertise, product thinking and problem\\-solving. Ask us how it has helped our ex\\-employees in their careers when you chat with us.
   

  

**What's It Like Here**
 We love debating over languages and frameworks and want someone who can bring their opinions to these discussions. We love reading/sharing articles, podcasts, and tech essays. If you are someone who loves tea or coffee, Marvel or DC, Peterson or Zizek, or even something eclectic, you will feel right at home. Continuous improvement is at the heart of everything we do at work \\& outside.
   

  

**This sounds good. But what exactly will you work on?**
 Since we are a service company, you will have the advantage of working on a wide gamut of problems, technology \\& real world\\-wise. You will be involved in all stages of a product lifecycle. You'll never have to wonder why you are working on something because you'll always know it.
   

  

**What are you currently working on?**
 We carefully select our clients. This is to ensure we are always indexed well on challenging work. They include indie entrepreneurs, Series B/C funded startups and big corporates.
   

  

 Some of the sectors we are working on
   

  

* Healthtech
* Edtech
* Insurtech
* Sportstech
* Fintech
* And much more!


 Trust us, there's never a dull day at work.
   

  

**Here‚Äôs What We Expect From You**
* You love coding and think of it as a craft. We wouldn‚Äôt have it otherwise.
* You have a solid grasp of the basics of Python or JavaScript/TypeScript.
* You‚Äôve built and maintained REST APIs using frameworks like Django/Django Rest Framework (Python) or Express/Fastify (Node.js).
* You understand persistence and can work your way around Django ORM or any SQL/NoSQL store confidently.
* You can set up and own your stack on a cloud provider of your choice.
* You have a good understanding of SOLID principles ‚Äî enough to know when they help and when they don‚Äôt.
* You aren‚Äôt complacent about your skillset and have a hunger to learn more.
* You like to share your learnings with others.


 If you have made it this far, I think we should have a chat. Apply now!

title: ReactJS Dev for a large SaaS Project - Long Term
description:
**Company Description** 




 Mvix, founded in 2005, is a leading provider of digital signage solutions, offering comprehensive services including hardware, free software, dynamic content, and implementation support. .
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time, remote role for a ReactJS Developer working on a large SaaS project with long\\-term opportunities. The ReactJS Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing scalable and efficient user interfaces using ReactJS. Day\\-to\\-day tasks include implementing front\\-end features, debugging and troubleshooting, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and ensuring code quality and performance. The role requires close collaboration with product managers and other developers to deliver a high\\-quality SaaS product.

* Proficiency in Software Development and Programming, particularly with ReactJS, JavaScript, and modern front\\-end technologies
* Strong Analytical Skills for troubleshooting, problem\\-solving, and optimizing performance
* Experience in working with API integrations and web services in a cloud\\-based environment
* Familiarity with SaaS platforms and experience in long\\-term project development is a plus
* Min 4yr experience with ReactJS

title: Embedded System Engineer
description:
**Overview** 
 :
 



  





 We‚Äôre looking for a Full Stack Embedded Systems Engineer who can bridge the gap between hardware and backend technologies. The ideal candidate is equally comfortable integrating Zigzag with IoT hardware (Raspberry Pi, ESP32, Arduino), and implementing real\\-time data communication via WebSockets etc. This role blends creativity, hardware tinkering, and software engineering to build interactive, connected systems.
 



  





**About Zigzag AI** 




  





 Zigzag AI is on a mission to revolutionise how management works.
 



  





 We‚Äôve built an AI manager that watches thought the cameras 24/7 ‚Äî to log what's going on, create reports, send alerts \\- manage, optimize, and streamline operations without human intervention. From factory floors to hospital wings, from hotel chains to government offices ‚Äî Zigzag is transforming how decisions are made and how work gets done.
 



  





 We work with 1000\\+ crore companies across manufacturing, healthcare, hospitality, real estate, government, and defence. And we‚Äôre just getting started.
 



  





 If you‚Äôre excited about solving real\\-world problems, building the future of autonomous management, and scaling a rocket ship from India to the world, we want you with us.
 



  





 Learn more: https://www.zig\\-zag.ai/

 , MQTT, or similar protocols.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

 for one of its

 About Enverus
 
 Enverus is the leading energy SaaS company delivering highly technical insights and predictive/prescriptive analytics that empower customers to make decisions that increase profit. Enverus‚Äô innovative technologies drive production and investment strategies, enable best practices for energy and commodity trading and risk management, and reduce costs through automated processes across critical business functions.
 



 Enverus is a strategic partner to more than
 **6,000 customers across 50 countries** 
 , helping shape the future of the global energy ecosystem.

 If you enjoy leveraging

 , building APIs and backend services

 using TypeScript

 and

 **data structures, algorithms, and system design**

 or agentic AI systems

 , or similar ML frameworks
* Knowledge of
 **energy industry** 
 workflows or
 **B2B SaaS platforms**
* Contributions to
 **open\\-source projects**
* Experience with
 **Infrastructure\\-as\\-Code** 
 tools like Terraform or CloudFormation


 What Makes You Successful at Enverus
 * **Ownership Mindset:** 
 You take responsibility for the quality, reliability, and scalability of what you build
* **Curiosity:** 
 You continuously learn and stay current with evolving technologies
* **Pragmatism:**

title: Engineer. Principal
description:
**Conviva is the intelligence layer for digital businesses, turning every consumer interaction into outcome\\-based intelligence‚Äîlinking engagement patterns across AI agents, apps, websites, and streaming video to real results such as purchases, bookings, and resolved support requests. Powered by its patented Time\\-State Technology¬Æ, the Conviva¬Æ Operational Data Platform delivers real\\-time insights and automation that help leading enterprises grow, improve satisfaction, and build lasting trust.**
 As Conviva is expanding, we are building products providing deep insights into end user experience for our customers. We are seeking a
 **Principal Engineer** 
 as an Individual Contributor.
   

  

 The vision for the team is to build data processing software that works on terabytes of streaming data in real time. Engineer the next\\-gen Spark\\-like system for in\\-memory computation of large time\\-series dataset‚Äôs ‚Äì both Spark\\-like backend infra and library based programming model. Build horizontally and vertically scalable system that analyses trillions of events per day within sub second latencies. Utilize the latest and greatest of big data technologies to build solutions for use\\-cases across multiple verticals. Lead technology innovation and advancement that will have big business impact for years to come. Be part of a worldwide team building software using the latest technologies and the best of software development tools and processes.
   

  

**What Success Will Look Like**
* Design, build and maintain the stream processing, time\\-series analysis system which is at the heart of Conviva‚Äôs products
* Responsible for architecture of Conviva platform
* Build features, enhancements, new services and bug fixing in Scala and Rust on a Jenkins based pipeline to be deployed as Docker containers on Kubernetes
* Own the entire lifecycle of your microservice including early specs, design, technology choice, development, unit\\-testing, integration\\-testing, documentation, deployment, troubleshooting, enhancements etc.
* Lead a team to develop a feature or parts of a the product
* Adhere to the Agile model of software development to plan, estimate and ship per business priority


**Who You Are \\& What You've Done**
* 14\\+ years of work experience in software development of data processing products.
* Engineering degree in software or equivalent from a premier institute.
* Excellent knowledge of fundamentals of Computer Science like algorithms and data structures. Hands\\-on with functional programming and know\\-how of its concepts
* Excellent programming and debugging skills. Proficient in writing code in Java/Rust /C\\+\\+ that is reliable, maintainable, secure, and performant
* Experience/knowledge of actor model of concurrency (Akka in Scala/Java or Actix in Rust) is a big plus. Knowledge of design patterns like event\\-streaming, CQRS and DDD to build large microservice architectures will be a big plus
* Experience with Kafka.
* Deep understanding of distributed systems concepts and scalability challenges including multi\\-threading, concurrency, sharding, partitioning etc.
* Experience/knowledge of API gateways and huge scale API deployments with Spikey workloads would be a big plus.


**To learn more about how Conviva can help improve the performance and outcomes of your digital services, visit** 
**www.conviva.com**

title: Senior Software Engineer - Cloud/HPC
description:
**Job Overview**
 Arm‚Äôs hardware is at the heart of the computing and connectivity revolution that continues to transform the way people live, and businesses operate. Working as a team and engaging with the world‚Äôs most famous technology companies, we are driving innovation into all areas where computation is possible. This will facilitate us to build better solutions for the billions of people using our technology worldwide based \\#onArm.
   

  

 We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer who will be developing and deploying innovative dashboards and automation to support the entire cloud, compute \\& storage infrastructure for all the SOC design team across Solutions Engineering. The candidate should be able to effectively communicate \\& collaborate with peers in their own team as well as with their counterparts in design engineering teams.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Development of automation, dashboards and cloud based solutions for effective and efficient management of design infrastructure
* Partnership \\& communication with peers for a broader collaboration


****Required Skills and Experience:****
* Bachelor‚Äôs/master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or Electronic Engineering from a reputable institute
* 4\\-8 years of shown experience.
* Deep expertise with IBM Platform LSF, including job lifecycle automation, distributed workload orchestration, resource allocation policies, and cluster configuration.
* Ability to develop automation that communicates with LSF (bsub, bjobs, lsload, bacct, etc.) and parse scheduling logs for insights.
* Experience improving cluster efficiency through job pattern analysis, fair\\-share tuning, and capacity modeling


****‚ÄúNice To Have‚Äù Skills and Experience:****
* Experience integrating LSF with HPC environments, cloud bursting (AWS ParallelCluster / custom HPC), and hybrid scheduling strategies.
* Knowledge of LSF event daemons, job arrays, resource reservation, and multi\\-cluster configurations


 At Arm, we are proud to have a set of behaviors that reflect our culture and guide our decisions, defining how we work together to defy ordinary and shape extraordinary.
   

  

 Our
 **10x mindset** 
 guides how we engineer, collaborate, and grow. Understand what it means and how to reflect 10x in your work: https://careers.arm.com/en/10x\\-mindset
   

  

****Accommodations at Arm****
 At Arm, we want to build extraordinary teams. If you need an adjustment or an accommodation during the recruitment process, please email accommodations@arm.com . To note, by sending us the requested information, you consent to its use by Arm to arrange for appropriate accommodations. All accommodation or adjustment requests will be treated with confidentiality, and information concerning these requests will only be disclosed as necessary to provide the accommodation. Although this is not an exhaustive list, examples of support include breaks between interviews, having documents read aloud, or office accessibility. Please email us about anything we can do to accommodate you during the recruitment process.
   

  

****Hybrid Working at Arm****
 Arm‚Äôs approach to hybrid working is designed to create a working environment that supports both high performance and personal wellbeing. We believe in bringing people together face to face to enable us to work at pace, whilst recognizing the value of flexibility. Within that framework, we empower groups/teams to determine their own hybrid working patterns, depending on the work and the team‚Äôs needs. Details of what this means for each role will be shared upon application. In some cases, the flexibility we can offer is limited by local legal, regulatory, tax, or other considerations, and where this is the case, we will collaborate with you to find the best solution. Please talk to us to find out more about what this could look like for you.
   

  

****Equal Opportunities at Arm****
 Arm is an equal opportunity employer, committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal opportunities are available to all applicants and colleagues. We are a diverse organization of dedicated and innovative individuals, and don‚Äôt discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

title: Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning - Data Platforms
description:
Teamwork makes the stream work.
 
 ¬†
 


**Roku is changing how the world watches TV** 

 Roku is the \\#1 TV streaming platform in the U.S., Canada, and Mexico, and we've set our sights on powering every television in the world. Roku pioneered streaming to the TV. Our mission is to be the TV streaming platform that connects the entire TV ecosystem. We connect consumers to the content they love, enable content publishers to build and monetize large audiences, and provide advertisers unique capabilities to engage consumers.
 



 From your first day at Roku, you'll make a valuable \\- and valued \\- contribution. We're a fast\\-growing public company where no one is a bystander. We offer you the opportunity to delight millions of TV streamers around the world while gaining meaningful experience across a variety of disciplines.
 



 ¬†
 




  

  

 About the team
 


 ¬†
 



 A reliable, privacy\\-safe, and scalable data foundation is critical to Roku‚Äôs rapidly growing advertising business. The Ad Data Activation organization builds the identity systems,¬†
 

 device¬†
 

 graph pipelines, audience platforms, insights tooling, and data collaboration capabilities that power targeting, measurement, and reporting across Roku Ads.
 


 ¬†
 






 We are hiring a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to help drive intelligence across these systems. You will work at the intersection of large\\-scale data platforms, applied machine learning, and generative AI ‚Äî building capabilities that make Roku's advertising data more actionable for internal teams and advertisers. This includes building core generative AI platform features for Roku Advertising, while also applying traditional ML techniques to improve accuracy, automation, and decisioning across the ecosystem. If you enjoy working across data, ML, and new Gen\\-AI patterns ‚Äî and want to shape how intelligence shows up inside Roku Ads ‚Äî this role is for you.
 


 ¬†
 



**About the role**

 ¬†
 



 In this role, you will design, build, and productionize intelligent capabilities that combine agentic Gen\\-AI systems with conventional ML pipelines across identity resolution, audience¬†
 

 modeling
 

 , attribution, and optimization workflows. You will work with massive¬†
 

 datasets, develop pipelines that transform raw signals into actionable features, and partner closely with product, data science, and platform teams.
 


 ¬†
 





 ¬†
 





 What you will be doing
 


 ¬†
 
* Develop scalable and effective ML models and data pipelines to power identity, graph enrichment, audience segmentation, and campaign performance intelligence


* Design and run experiments, measure impact, and translate results into product decisions and customer outcomes


* Build and productionize agentic, generative\\-AI features ‚Äî including reporting and insights agents, campaign\\-monitoring agents (with human\\-in\\-the\\-loop controls), and a semantic layer for reliable, natural\\-language analytics


* Improve automation, reliability, and scalability across model training, feature engineering, deployment, and monitoring frameworks


* Work closely with software and ML engineers to deliver end\\-to\\-end solutions from data ingestion through downstream systems


* Partner with senior stakeholders to shape ML and Gen\\-AI strategy for Ad Data Activation ‚Äî¬†
 

 identifying
 

 ¬†the right problems for AI, ensuring safety, and driving advertiser productivity
 

 .




  

 We‚Äôre
 

 ¬†excited if you have
 


 ¬†
 
* 5\\+ years of experience applying ML or data science to¬†
 

 real business
 

 ¬†problems at scale


* Master‚Äôs degree (or higher) and 4\\+ years of experience in CS, CE, ML, or a related field


* Strong CS fundamentals and ability to design efficient algorithms and production systems


* Experience with ML approaches used in large\\-scale data problems (e.g., regression, classification, tree\\-based methods, embeddings, sequence models, or basic NLP)


* Strong intuition for defining KPIs, objective functions, and evaluation frameworks for ML\\-driven systems




 ¬†
 






 PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
 


 ¬†
 



* Knowledge of programming languages such as Python,¬†
 

 Scala/
 

 Java, C/C\\+\\+, or similar


* Experience working with large\\-scale data platforms (Spark, Presto/Trino, feature stores, data lakes, etc.)


* Experience building or integrating with LLM/Gen\\-AI pipelines (prompting, evaluation, retrieval, safety) is a plus


* Prior publications, patents, or open\\-source contributions are a plus



 ¬†
 


**Our Hybrid Work Approach** 

 Roku fosters an inclusive and collaborative environment where teams work in the office Monday through Thursday. Fridays are flexible for remote work except for employees whose roles are required to be in the office five days a week or employees who are in offices with a five day in office policy.
 



 ¬†
 


**Benefits** 

 Roku is committed to offering a diverse range of benefits as part of our compensation package to support our employees and their families. Our comprehensive benefits include global access to mental health and financial wellness support and resources. Local benefits include statutory and voluntary benefits which may include healthcare (medical, dental, and vision), life, accident, disability, commuter, and retirement options (401(k)/pension). Our employees can take time off work for vacation and other personal reasons to balance their evolving work and life needs. It's important to note that not every benefit is available in all locations or for every role. For details specific to your location, please consult with your recruiter.
 



 ¬†
 


**Accommodations** 

 Roku welcomes applicants of all backgrounds and provides reasonable accommodations and adjustments in accordance with applicable law. If you require reasonable accommodation at any point in the hiring process, please direct your inquiries to EmployeeRelations@Roku.com.
 



 ¬†
 


**The Roku Culture** 

 Roku is a great place for people who want to work in a fast\\-paced environment where everyone is focused on the company's success rather than their own. We try to surround ourselves with people who are great at their jobs, who are easy to work with, and who keep their egos in check. We appreciate a sense of humor. We believe a fewer number of very talented folks can do more for less cost than a larger number of less talented teams. We're independent thinkers with big ideas who act boldly, move fast and accomplish extraordinary things through collaboration and trust. In short, at Roku you'll be part of a company that's changing how the world watches TV.
 



 We have a unique culture that we are proud of. We think of ourselves primarily as problem\\-solvers, which itself is a two\\-part idea. We come up with the solution, but the solution isn't real until it is built and delivered to the customer. That penchant for action gives us a pragmatic approach to innovation, one that has served us well since 2002\\.
 



 To learn more about Roku, our global footprint, and how we've grown, visit https://www.weareroku.com/factsheet.
 



 By providing your information, you acknowledge that you want Roku to contact you about job roles, that you have read Roku's Applicant Privacy Notice, and understand that Roku will use your information as described in that notice. If you do not wish to receive any communications from Roku regarding this role or similar roles in the future, you may unsubscribe at any time by emailing WorkforcePrivacy@Roku.com.

title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer- Network Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
 Entain India is the engineering and delivery powerhouse for Entain, one of the world‚Äôs leading global sports and gaming groups. Established in Hyderabad in 2001, we‚Äôve grown from a small tech hub into a dynamic force, delivering cutting\\-edge software solutions and support services that power billions of transactions for millions of users worldwide.
   

  

 Our focus on quality at scale drives us to create innovative technology that supports Entain‚Äôs mission to lead the change in global sports and gaming sector. At Entain India, we make the impossible possible, together.
   

  

**Job Description**
* The Senior Infrastructure Engineer executes a range of activities using Automation, Enterprise Systems Management (ESM), and Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CICD) technologies, delivering key capabilities within the infrastructure landscape.
* Executes the implementation of high\\-level designs for stable network and infrastructure environments that meet the needs of Entain, are shared with partners, and are compliant with current security, privacy, and audit requirements.
* Maintains IT Infrastructure components, tools or locations and ensures the creation of designs on services (e.g., network, security, storage, compute), produced in line with design standards, with minimal guidance
* Provides technical knowledge and expertise where needed to support managers, principals or technical experts to resolve issues
* Collaborates with application development, enterprise architecture, infrastructure and cyber security teams to develop and implement a compelling product roadmap
* Executes the automation and orchestration capabilities across the environment and establishes processes and procedures that promote efficiency, solving a range of day\\-to\\-day user problems
* Delivers day\\-to\\-day support to internal tools and system health, as well as infrastructure implemented for all projects and manages customer support contracts
* Collaborates with technical architects, using technical knowledge and experience to translate architectural designs into operations
* Documents the processes, measurements, and assessments required for both individual and project work
* Continuously develops and shares with team knowledge on emerging trends and changes in infrastructure engineering
* Supports the implementation of ways to improve working processes within the area of infrastructure engineering responsibility through data analysis, including network and infrastructure performance and health, to identify issues and areas for improvement


**Qualifications**
**Qualifications: Education \\& Experience**
* Education: Completed a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or a related field.
* Experience: Minimum of 5 years of hands\\-on experience in core networking.
* Language: Fluent English (minimum B1 level) is a prerequisite.


**Technical Skills**
**Core Networking**
* Network Topology \\& TCP/IP: Strong foundational knowledge for designing and troubleshooting networks.
* DNS: Expertise in name resolution and application connectivity.
* Routing \\& Switching (Cisco/Juniper): Proficient in managing enterprise networks and ensuring efficient traffic flow.
* Firewalls (FortiGate/Palo Alto): Skilled in network security and segmentation.


**Advanced Networking**
* Load Balancing (F5/HAProxy): Ensures high availability and application performance.
* DDoS Mitigation: Experience in protecting against large\\-scale attacks.
* Application Layer: Understanding of HTTP/HTTPS, SSL/TLS for secure communication.


**Monitoring \\& Automation**
* Network Monitoring: Familiarity with SNMP, REST APIs, and monitoring tools for proactive issue detection.
* Scripting \\& Automation: Proficient in PowerShell, Python, Terraform, and Git for deployments and CI/CD integration.


**Cloud \\& Remote Access**
* Cloud Technologies (AWS/GCP): Ability to design and manage hybrid or cloud\\-native network architectures using services like VPC, Direct Connect, and Transit Gateway.
* Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) with Palo Alto: Implement secure remote access solutions based on Zero Trust principles, ensuring identity\\-based access control and minimizing attack surfaces.


**Social Skills**
* Strong communication skills.
* Excellent problem\\-solving and analytical abilities.
* Ability to perform under pressure and in stressful situations.
* Team player with the capability to work independently when required.
* Self\\-motivated, proactive, and delivery\\-focused working attitude.


**Additional Requirement**
* On\\-Call Support: Must be available to participate in an on\\-call rota if required.


**Additional Information**
 We know that signing top players requires a great starting package, and plenty of support to inspire peak performance. Join us, and a competitive salary is just the beginning.
   

  

 Depending on your role and location, you can expect to receive benefits like:
   

  

* Safe home pickup and home drop (Hyderabad Office Only)
* Group Mediclaim policy
* Group Critical Illness policy
* Communication \\& Relocation allowance
* Annual Health check


 And outside of this, you‚Äôll have the chance to turn recognition from leaders and colleagues into amazing prizes. Join a winning team of talented people and be a part of an inclusive and supporting community where everyone is celebrated for being themselves.
   

  

*Should you need any adjustments or accommodations to the recruitment process, at either application or interview, please contact us.*
 At Entain India, we do what‚Äôs right. It‚Äôs one of our core values and that‚Äôs why we're taking the lead when it comes to creating a diverse, equitable and inclusive future \\- for our people, and the wider global sports betting and gaming sector. However you identify, across any protected characteristic, our ambition is to ensure our‚ÄØpeople across the globe feel valued, respected and their individuality celebrated.
   

  

 We comply with all applicable recruitment regulations and employment laws in the jurisdictions where we operate, ensuring ethical and compliant hiring practices globally.
   

  

*Should you need any adjustments or accommodations to the recruitment process, at either application or interview, please contact us.*

title: Senior PIM (Salsify) Developer
description:
Minimum Qualifications: \\- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (BE, B.Tech, ME, M.Tech, MCA, MSc). \\- Proven experience with PIM systems, particularly Salsify and Akeneo, with a minimum of 5 years of expertise. \\- Strong understanding of product data management and integration techniques. Preferred Qualifications: \\- Experience in CMS development and integration, with a focus on enhancing user experience. \\- Demonstrated ability to lead projects and collaborate with diverse teams. \\- Track record of successful PIM implementations that drive business growth. \\- Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail. Good to have skills: Flask, Pandas, Data Analysis, Springboot, Hibernate
   

  

 Key Responsibilities: \\- Develop and maintain comprehensive PIM solutions using Salsify, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems. \\- Lead the implementation of Akeneo for effective product data management and synchronization. \\- Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design and execute CMS strategies that support business objectives. \\- Analyze and optimize data workflows to improve efficiency and accuracy. \\- Provide expert guidance and training to junior developers and stakeholders on PIM best practices.
   

  

 About us: Infosys is a global leader in next\\-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over four decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI\\-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always\\-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise, and ideas from our innovation ecosystem. Infosys provides equal employment opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to race, color, sex, gender identity; sexual orientation, religious practices and observances; national origin; pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions; status as a protected veteran or spouse/family member of a protected veteran; or disability.
